text: Igor Muradyan (, April 29, 1957 – June 17, 2018) was an Armenian political activist. He was one of the earliest leaders of the Karabakh movement, along with Zori Balayan, Silva Kaputikyan and Viktor Hambardzumyan. Muradyan died in Yerevan, Armenia on June 17, 2018 at the age of 61.Умер Игорь Мурадян – первый руководитель комитета "Карабах" ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Armenian activists Category:People from Baku
title: Igor Muradyan
